languages.text: "Насколько мне известно, в нашем ремесле паранойя за недостаток не считается. А чернь — она завсегда замышляет, уж поверьте".
"To the best of my knowledge, being paranoid is practically a requirement in our line of work. In any case, the rabble are always plotting. Take my word for it."
languages.original_text: "Насколько мне известно, в нашем ремесле паранойя за недостаток не считается. А чернь — она завсегда замышляет, уж поверьте".

traits.locale_text: "As far as I know, paranoia isn't considered a drawback in our line of work. And the rabble is always plotting, take my word for it."
"As far as I know, paranoia isn't considered a drawback in our line of work. And the rabble is always plotting, take my word for it."
"To the best of my knowledge, being paranoid is practically a requirement in our line of work. In any case, the rabble are always plotting. Take my word for it."
"To the best of my knowledge, being paranoid is practically a requirement in our line of work. In any case, the rabble are always plotting. Take my word for it."
"To the best of my knowledge, being paranoid is practically a requirement in our line of work. In any case, the rabble are always plotting. Take my word for it."
"To the best of my knowledge, being paranoid is practically a requirement in our line of work. In any case, the rabble are always plotting. Take my word for it."

languages.text: «Hasta donde sé, la paranoia es prácticamente un requisito para este trabajo. En cualquier caso, la turba siempre está planeando algo. Créame».
languages.original_text: "To the best of my knowledge, being paranoid is practically a requirement in our line of work. In any case, the rabble are always plotting. Take my word for it."

traits.locale_text: «Hasta donde sé, la paranoia es prácticamente un requisito para este trabajo. En cualquier caso, la turba siempre está planeando algo. Créame».

languages.text: 「私の知る限り、編集的であることは仕事において事実上の必須条件です。いずれにせよ、暴徒たちは常に陰謀を企んでいる。私の言うことを信じて下さい」
languages.original_text: "To the best of my knowledge, being paranoid is practically a requirement in our line of work. In any case, the rabble are always plotting. Take my word for it."

traits.locale_text: 「私の知る限り、編集的であることは仕事において事実上の必須条件です。いずれにせよ、暴徒たちは常に陰謀を企んでいる。私の言うことを信じて下さい」

languages.text: “据我所知，不偏执的人根本干不了这一行。无论如何，那些暴民始终都在密谋暴乱。我是说真的。”
languages.original_text: "To the best of my knowledge, being paranoid is practically a requirement in our line of work. In any case, the rabble are always plotting. Take my word for it."

traits.locale_text: “据我所知，不偏执的人根本干不了这一行。无论如何，那些暴民始终都在密谋暴乱。我是说真的。”

languages.text: "Soweit ich weiß, ist es in unserem Beruf praktisch eine Grundanforderung, paranoid zu sein. Wie auch immer, der Pöbel plant immer irgendetwas. Das könnt Ihr mir glauben."
languages.original_text: "To the best of my knowledge, being paranoid is practically a requirement in our line of work. In any case, the rabble are always plotting. Take my word for it."

traits.locale_text: "Soweit ich weiß, ist es in unserem Beruf praktisch eine Grundanforderung, paranoid zu sein. Wie auch immer, der Pöbel plant immer irgendetwas. Das könnt Ihr mir glauben."

languages.text: « Dans notre corps de métier, la paranoïa est presque un prérequis. Quoi qu'il en soit, les gens du bas peuple ne cessent jamais de comploter. Vous pouvez me croire sur parole. »
languages.original_text: "To the best of my knowledge, being paranoid is practically a requirement in our line of work. In any case, the rabble are always plotting. Take my word for it."

traits.locale_text: « Dans notre corps de métier, la paranoïa est presque un prérequis. Quoi qu'il en soit, les gens du bas peuple ne cessent jamais de comploter. Vous pouvez me croire sur parole. »

languages.text: "Bildiğim kadarıyla paranoyak olmak, bizim meslekte bir gereksinimden ibaret. Ne olursa olsun ayaktakımı her daim komplo kurar. Sözüme güvenin."
languages.original_text: "To the best of my knowledge, being paranoid is practically a requirement in our line of work. In any case, the rabble are always plotting. Take my word for it."
